Container.Name: lgtv-alexa-skill
Container.Overview: This Docker image creates a Node.js server to act as a bridge between an LGTV running webOS and Alexa-based devices, and a select set of skills to control basic functions, inputs and webOS applications. TBD: Include additional details regarding configuration setup for end-users, including adding inputs and WebOS native application support.
